sentences.sentence: He hadn't done any more than Young had been able to do, so he couldn't disprove the dominant theory.
sentences.translation: 他所做的和杨所能做的一样多，所以他无法反驳占主导地位的理论。

sentences.sentence: They accepted what he had said in default of any evidence to disprove it.
sentences.translation: 由于缺乏相反的证据，他们相信了他的话。

sentences.sentence: The statistics to prove or disprove his hypothesis will take years to collect.
sentences.translation: 要花数年来收集证实或推翻他的假设的数据。
